welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Riverdale, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, delicious food, and friendly locals. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore our city and experience all that it has to offer."

terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.
